location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge at Bushire to Major George Willock, Secretary in Charge of HM British Mission, Tabrize [Tabriz]

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding sundry letters and newspapers (not present); it notes that a box of stationary will follow shortly.It further informs Major Willock that Lieutenant Lynam has been granted permission to return to Europe via Persia.
